Domain Statement Description: A unique coding mechanism is required to access all the data on the internet.

The goal of Domain Names is to provide a mechanism for naming resources in such a way that the names are usable in different hosts, networks, protocol families, internets, and administrative organizations.
Users want to access the resources via Human-readable labels.
The Internet is a large solution space with billions of artefacts.
Users wish to access resource over the intenet.
